mapper.select:
select count(m.id) from V7_STORE_OUT m
1=1
and m.v7_s_brand like '%${brandName}%'
and m.v7_s_type like '%${brandType}%'
and m.v7_s_name like '%${productName}%'
and m.v7_s_oper_time > #{startTime}
and m.v7_s_oper_time < #{endTime}

SELECT o.v7_s_type v7SType, SUM(o.v7_s_count) v7SCount, SUM(o.v7_s_price_count) v7SPriceCount FROM V7_STORE_IN o WHERE o.v7_s_oper_time > #{startTime} AND o.v7_s_oper_time < #{endTime} GROUP BY o.v7_s_type
mapper.sql: id, v7_s_brand, v7_s_type, v7_s_name, v7_s_out_type, v7_s_standard, v7_s_unit, v7_s_price, v7_s_count, v7_s_price_count, v7_s_oper_user, v7_s_oper_time, v7_s_update_user, v7_s_update_time, v7_s_status, v7_pk_store_quantity, v7_pk_product, extends1, extends2, extends3, extends4, extends5
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from V7_STORE_OUT
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from V7_STORE_OUT
order by ${orderByClause}
